general.title: 1. General Provisions
general.description: This policy governs the withdrawal and refund processes on the TRX platform. We strive to ensure a safe and efficient process for all users.

process.title: 2. Withdrawal Process
items: Withdrawals are available after full account verification
Minimum withdrawal amount depends on the selected network
Processing time varies depending on network congestion
Withdrawal fees are set according to current rates

refund.title: 3. Refund Policy
refund.description: In case of erroneous transfers or technical issues, refunds are considered on a case-by-case basis by our support service.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.description: TRX maintains strict Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and Counter-Terrorism Financing (CTF) policies in accordance with international standards.

obligations.title: 3. User Obligations
obligations.description: Users agree to provide accurate information and comply with the platform's AML/CTF policy requirements.

purpose.title: 1. Policy Purpose
purpose.description: This policy defines principles for managing conflicts of interest and ensures fair treatment of all platform users.

management.title: 3. Conflict Management
management.description: We implement a range of measures to prevent and manage conflicts of interest, including segregation of duties, information control, and regular audits.

general.title: 1. General Risks
general.description: Cryptocurrency trading involves high risk of loss of invested funds. Market volatility can lead to significant losses in short periods.

recommendations.title: 3. Recommendations
recommendations.description: Only invest funds you can afford to lose. It is recommended to thoroughly study the market and conduct your own analysis before trading.

general.title: 1. General Provisions
general.description: This User Agreement governs the relationship between TRX and platform users. By using our services, you agree to the terms of this agreement.

security.title: 3. Security
security.description: Users agree to follow all security measures, including protecting account credentials and using two-factor authentication.
